name: V!RU5
description:
V!RU5 has a lore filled game about a intelligent virus that is trying to take over the internet. You are the anti-virus trying to stop the virus and to find more about the lore it is in the GDD located within the first file called "V!RU5" GDD. 

V!RU5 was made in 6 months for a competition called the Australian STEM video game challenge.

V!RU5 was entirely built(this includes all assets, sounds, etc beside using the A* path finding system)

10A games consist of : BLAKE WALKER, RILEY GATTERMAYR, JACOB SHERWOOD, OSCAR GOBELL
